name: MartiniqueBanquets
overview: For the past 40 years, The Martinique Banquet Complex has been the premier location for weddings & banquets. Formally known as, The Drury Lane Theatre/Martinique Banquets on 95th street and Western Ave in Evergreen Park. We had the pleasure of hosting numerous star concerts, plays, ice shows, weddings and special events. Our passion for weddings and special events continues in our new location and guest have come to appreciate and expect personalized attention, cordial service and quality of food Martinique Banquet Complex is known to provide. We have two completely private banquet rooms offering a charming and elegant atmosphere to accommodate up to 400 of your selected guest. The enchanted Wedding Garden and Gazebo is also a serene and romantic setting for the ceremony of your dreams. Your event, whether big or small, for business or pleasure, will have the pomp and circumstance you are seeking. Let us provide you and your guest with an unforgettable experience. Services: 1. Grand Ballroom, 2. Celebrity Ballroom, 3. Wedding Garden, 4. Wedding Photography, 5. Wedding Videos.
